A7100(N7100) Capacitive Screen android 4.0 Smart phone   Type: Capacitance Touch screen Smart phone Color: White / Black/Pink/blue/orange OS: Android 4.0 CPU: Spreadtrum SP6820A Cortex A5 1.0GHz ROM: 256MB RAM: 256MB Capacitive touch screen Network frequency: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz Dual SIM, Dual standby Dual cameras (the back one with flash light) Wireless internet Gravity sensing system FM/MP3/MP4/Bluetooth function supported
Network	 Network type: GSM Frequency: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz(if your sim card doesnot fit these frequency,pls donot buy it.) WIFI: 802.11b/g wireless internet Bluetooth A2DP  Screen Information	 Screen type: Capacitive Screen size: 4.0 inch Screen resolution: 480 x 320 (HVGA)  Connectivity	 2 x SIM slot TF card slot 3.5mm audio out port Microphone  Speaker
Camera	 Back camera: 3.1MP (with flash light) Front camera: 0.3MP Video recording: Yes  Storage	 Internal memory: 180MB RAM 207MB External memory: TF card up to 32GB (not included)  Media Formats	 Picture format: JPEG, GIF, BMP, PNG Video format: 3GP, MP4 Music format: MP3, OGG, WAV MS Office format: Word, Excel, PPT E-book format: TXT Live wallpaper support: Yes Games: Android APK  Languages	 English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Italian etc..  Dimensions	 Product size (L x W x H): 116 x 70 x 10 mm Product weight: 123 g Package weight: 0.43 kg  Additional Features	 Wi-Fi, FM, Bluetooth, E-book, Sound Recorder, MP3, MP4, MMS, Alarm, Calendar, Calculator...
